Caches shader uniforms, reducing the number of times they are invoked.
palladium.config.vertex_attribute.toolti: Caching vertex attributes, reducing the number of times they are invoked.
palladium.config.mipmap_level.tooltip: Caching mipmap levels, reducing the number of times they are invoked.
palladium.config.data_fix.tooltip:
Data fixers are involved in transferring worlds from one version to another. 
Enabling this speed up game loading. 
Before updating the game to a new version, it is recommended to disable this option.
palladium.config.resource_location_dedup: Deletes duplicates of chosen resource location.
palladium.config.lightweight_attack_ai.t: Optimizes target finding of cat and wolf.
palladium.config.lightweight_flee_ai.too: Optimizes position finding for flee goals of wolf and rabbit.
